Title: MultiVolumeControl
Description: MVC is a small control allowing one to adjust all or one audio devices at the same time. A very useful feature is the global hotkeys you can configure.
HomeWiki:
MultiVolumeControl
MVC is a small control allowing one to adjust all or one audio devices at the same time. A very useful feature is the global hotkeys you can configure.

Especially when using a HDMI screen at the same time as your built-in speakers, this tool becomes handy.
